title: Vegetarian aubergine lasagne
ingredients: ['2 medium aubergine, sliced into 1cm rounds', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '6 lasagne sheets, cooked', 'For the tomato sauce', '2 medium onions, chopped', '600g tinned chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon herbes de Provence', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'For the cheese sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '300ml milk', '1/2 teaspoon prepared mustard', '115g grated cheese', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese']
